Summary: Looked into crystal-clear sky at Orion and Pleiades after a peripheral flash of light caught my attention. Then saw 2 more, putting it down to meteorites.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Havertown
There were no other sightings in Havertown on or around November 3rd 2011
divs: sighting detailstook the dog out, and my attention was caught by a flash above me. two more meteor-type flashes happened after that, between orion and pleaides, but nearer to orion. just wanted to add this because of a report from georgia (2011\11\02)that reported something odd at 5:45am that morning. familiar with "falling stars", i have not yet seen several fall from the same area at one time. (probably just not outside enough!)
